snippet.title: Quell Reflect Announcement Trailer (iOS)
snippet.description:
A charming zen puzzler that is sure to test your brain and capture your heart!

http://itunes.apple.com/us/app/quell-reflect/id455533949?mt=8&ign-mpt=uo%3D4

Quell Reflect has 80+ levels of ingenious gameplay, a gorgeous art style, and a haunting soundtrack.

The objective is simple: slide a droplet around a layout of obstacles, traps and pathways, until you have collected all the pearls. Underneath this simple gameplay lies a world of intricacy!

Quell Reflect's appeal lies in its gentle, soothing mood, which makes it a great way to unwind.

If you played the original Quell, you'll be delighted with the new gameplay features. If not, then now's the time to find out what you've been missing!

Here's what the reviewers said about Quell:

"Quell. Is. Perfect" - No Dpad 
"Woozily hypnotic" - Eurogamer
"Beautifully relaxing" - AppSpy
"Calming zen-like atmosphere" - Gamezebo
"Absolute joy to play" - Pocket Full of Apps

What our customers said about Quell:

"Great puzzles that will have you wracking your brain!" - Roc991
"Beautiful game! One of the very few I keep coming back to!" - Marco 234
"Soothing music and muted palette took me to a beautiful place..." - Neil M

Features:
* Game Center Achievements and Leaderboards
* Universal support for iPod, iPhone and iPad
* HD and Retina support
* Over 80 levels of cunningly crafted puzzles
* Gorgeous hand-painted art style
* Custom soundtrack by renowned composer Steven Cravis
* Perfectly balanced difficulty curve

About the developer:
Fallen Tree Games is listed #60 in the 2011 Develop 100 - a ranking of the 'World's Most Successful Game Studios'.

Try Quell Reflect today, and fall in love with this enchanting experience...

Sign up for our mailing list to be the first to hear the latest Quell Reflect news! 

http://www.Facebook.com/quell.game
http://www.Twitter.com/fallentreegames
http://www.Fallentreegames.com
